name: The Bug Knight
description: A mod that attempts to add the Knight from Hollow Knight as a Playable Character, NL All rights for Hollow Knight belong to Team Cherry. NL Please Support them by playing Hollow Knight: https://hollowknight.com/. NL Hollow Knight: Silksong is coming out soon!
credits: Thanks in part due to the efforts of Gremious, the Great people at the STS Modding Discord, and of course: Team Cherry, Silksong HYPE
